MemoryInfobox.description: 'When the fierce warrior Roxana met Kassandra, she knew she had found the perfect training partner for the Battle of One Hundred Hands.'

General_Description: '''Sparring with Roxana''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Kassandra encountered a fierce warrior named [[Roxana]] who was preparing for the [[Battle of One Hundred Hands]].
Section_Dialogue:
While exploring [[Hydrea]], Kassandra heard a number of conversations. *'''Civilian 1:''' ''This is Roxana's year. She's going to win the Battle of One Hundred Hands for sure.'' *'''Civilian 2:''' ''What? She doesn't even have an official training partner.'' *'''Civilian 1:''' ''It's because she's too good for any of them!'' She arrived at a [[Hydrea Apple Farm|farm]]. *'''Civilian 3:''' ''Roxana nearly killed my son when they sparred this week.'' *'''Civilian 4:''' ''He's lucky. Had it been in the Battle she would have killed him.'' *'''Civilian 3:''' ''...Yeah.'' [[File:ACOD Sparring with Roxana 2.png|thumb|250px|Roxana knocking out her partner]] Kassandra arrived at a training area near the farm, where a woman was berating her sparring partners. *'''Roxana:''' ''You amateurs are wasting my time.'' Kassandra approached as the woman knocked out one of her sparring partners. *'''Kassandra:''' ''These men look like they need a [[doctor]].'' *'''Roxana:''' ''They're lousy sparring partners, every last one. I need professionals to practice with before the Battle of One Hundred Hands. I need a champion.'' |-|I'm your champion.= *'''Kassandra:''' ''Maybe your "champion" has arrived.'' *'''Roxana:''' ''Is that right? If you're serious, I'm a sanctioned competitor in the battle. You practice with me, and [[Drakios]] will let both of us officially enter.'' |-|I'm a humble misthios.= *'''Kassandra:''' ''I'm just a working ''[[Mercenary|misthios]]'', not a "champion". Still, I might be able to help you with your problem.'' *'''Roxana:''' ''Well, I won't be able to pay you in any traditional way, but I am a sanctioned competitor in the Battle. If you train with me, we can both officially enter.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''This battle-'' *'''Roxana:''' ''The Battle of One Hundred Hands is the most grueling contest in the [[Greece|Greek]] world. The body count is high, and the chance of success low. Are you sure that's something you want to train for?'' |-|Killing is my specialty.= *'''Kassandra:''' ''Killing's what I do, and I do it well.'' *'''Roxana:''' ''You have the right attitude, I'll give you that. But you can't simply power your way to victory in the Battle of One Hundred Hands. It takes preparation.'' |-|I'll do my best.= *'''Kassandra:''' ''I'm prepared to work hard. The rest lies with the [[Fates]].'' *'''Roxana:''' ''Humility is a fine trait in a warrior—as long as it's hiding true ferocity below the surface. That's what's needed in the Battle.'' (If players asked "Why do you want to fight in the Battle?") *'''Kassandra:''' ''If this battle is so difficult, why enter it at all?'' *'''Roxana:''' ''I'm not from a family of means, champion, and have always dreamed about the Hundred-Hands purse. My father, my brother tried to win it years ago. Even my mother entered last time, and now they're all gone. Dead.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''You want the [[drachma]]e.'' *'''Roxana:''' ''I don't care about the drachmae, not now. I need to save my family's legacy from the edge of yet another champion's blade - I need to win and become like a hero of old.'' (If players asked "What makes you think you can win?") *'''Kassandra:''' ''If the battle's so hard, why do you think you'll win?'' *'''Roxana:''' ''I train at all hours until my body gives out. Before bed, I make offerings to [[Ares]]. I wake in the night to strategize. And then... I rise in the morning to do it all again.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''That's an impressive amount of work.'' *'''Roxana:''' ''If I don't win the Battle, at least I'll know I've done all I can.'' (If players asked "Where's Drakios?") *'''Kassandra:''' ''You mentioned I should talk to Drakios about officially entering the Battle. Where can I find him?'' *'''Roxana:''' ''He's usually in the town on [[Melos]] - doesn't go far.'' (If players chose "I think I can handle the Battle.") *'''Kassandra:''' ''Let's say I want to fight in the Battle of One Hundred Hands...'' *'''Roxana:''' ''Then fight me and prove you are a worthy training companion.'' (Accept – "Let's fight.") *'''Kassandra:''' ''You asked for it.'' The two women drew their weapons and began to spar. *'''Roxana:''' ''Come on, ''misthios. Roxana managed to strike Kassandra. *'''Kassandra:''' That'' hurt''. *'''Roxana:''' ''Ooh, I've made you angry.
Stings, doesn't it, champion?'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''I've felt worse.'' *'''Roxana:''' ''You're cute when you're angry.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''What?'' Roxana giggled. *'''Kassandra:''' ''I'm not angry.'' *'''Roxana:''' ''Of course not.'' The match continued. *'''Roxana:''' ''You need to push me!
Are you even trying?
Nice move.'' [[File:ACOD Sparring with Roxana 5.png|thumb|250px|Roxana being helped up by Kassandra]] Kassandra eventually defeated Roxana and knocked her down. She sheathed her weapons and offered her hand. Roxana grasped it and Kassandra helped her up to her feet. *'''Roxana:''' ''It seems you ''are'' the champion I've been looking for. A real [[Sparta]]n, if I'm right.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''You are.'' *'''Roxana:''' ''I sensed it in the way you fought. Aggressive, but not reckless.
My name's Roxana.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''Kassandra.'' *'''Roxana:''' ''Next on the agenda is archery training. Are you ready?'' |-|Accept – Let's do it.= *'''Kassandra:''' ''I'm ready.'' *'''Roxana:''' ''So eager! Well, a shipment of [[Wolf|wolves]] has [[Hydrea Shipwreck|wrecked]] on shore nearby. They were meant to be part of the Battle, but now, they're our practice targets.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''Let's go hunting.'' Kassandra left with Roxana to hunt the wolves. |-|Not right now.= *'''Kassandra:''' ''I have other things to attend to first.'' *'''Roxana:''' ''When you're ready, there's a shipwreck on the north coast of the island. Meet me there.'' Roxana took her leave, hinting a mild annoyance at the delay, to which Kassandra raised an eyebrow. She eventually met up with her at the shipwreck.
Section_Outcome: Kassandra and Roxana became training partners in preparation for the Battle of One Hundred Hands.
Section_Trivia:
*The game used to have a bug wherein this quest was rendered unavailable if Roxana was spoken to before speaking with Drakios and getting the [[Call to Arms (Melos)|Call to Arms]] quest, only leaving the option to pay to start [[The Great Contender]]. After patch 1.06 this quest was rendered completely unavailable, even if the player had acquired Call to Arms before setting foot on the Hydrea island.
*As of October 2019, the quest no longer bugs, and the questchain is possible to complete even before talking with Drakios.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
